citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
One adult dog's outdoor run had waste that hadn't been cleaned out daily. A daily spot clean of hard surfaces that dogs
can touch is important to keep their living space clean and comfortable. Excreta and food waste on hard surfaces that
dogs can contact must be removed from primary enclosures daily. Ensure that a routine of daily spot cleaning waste from
hard surfaces that dogs can touch is put into place and maintained.
***Correct from 10/10/2024 forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.11(a) 
   
Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control. 
One adult dog's outdoor run had waste that hadn't been cleaned out daily. A daily spot clean of hard surfaces that dogs 
can touch is important to keep their living space clean and comfortable. Excreta and food waste on hard surfaces that 
dogs can contact must be removed from primary enclosures daily. Ensure that a routine of daily spot cleaning waste from 
hard surfaces that dogs can touch is put into place and maintained.  
***Correct from 10/10/2024 forward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
